Identification.ShortTitle: General Export Permit No. Ex. 31 — Peanut Butter
Identification.LongTitle: General Permit Authorizing the Exportation of Peanut Butter to All Countries Other than the United States

Provision.Text: The Secretary of State for External Affairs, pursuant to subsection 7(1.1)* of the Export and Import Permits Act, hereby issues the annexed General permit authorizing the exportation of peanut butter to any country other than the United States, effective on the day on which section 107 of An Act to implement the Agreement Establishing the World Trade Organization, being chapter 47 of the Statutes of Canada, 1994, comes into force.

SignatureTitle.Emphasis: Secretary of State for External Affairs

Section.Text: This Permit may be cited as General Export Permit No. Ex. 31 — Peanut Butter.
In this Permit, peanut butter means goods that are classified under tariff item No. 2008.11.10 in the List of Tariff Provisions set out in the schedule to the Customs Tariff. (beurre d’arachides)
Any person may, under authority of this Permit, export peanut butter to any country other than the United States.
